verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> there was הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> Again there was a day וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> when the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> to present עַל־ <WH5921> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> themselves before the LORD וַיָּב֤וֹא <WH935> came גַֽם־ <WH1571> also הַשָּׂטָן֙ <WH7854> and Satan בְּתֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> also among לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> them to present עַל־ <WH5921> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> himself before the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> unto Satan אֵ֥י <WH335> From whence מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> have you תָּבֹ֑א <WH935> comest וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <WH7854> thou? And Satan אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said מִשֻּׁ֣ט <WH7751> From going to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּמֵהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <WH1980> and from walking up and down בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <WH7854> unto Satan הֲשַׂ֣מְתָּ <WH7760> Hast thou לִבְּךָ֮ <WH3820> considered אֶל־ <WH413> about עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant אִיּוֹב֒ <WH347> Job כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֵ֨ין <WH369> is no כָּמֹ֜הוּ <WH3644> like בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> that [there is] none like him in the earth אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man תָּ֧ם <WH8535> a perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> and an upright יְרֵ֥א <WH3373> one that feareth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וְסָ֣ר <WH5493> and escheweth מֵרָ֑ע <WH7451> evil וְעֹדֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH5750> still מַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> holds בְּתֻמָּת֔וֹ <WH8538> his integrity וַתְּסִיתֵ֥נִי <WH5496> although thou movedst ב֖וֹ לְבַלְּע֥וֹ <WH1104> me against him to destroy חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> him without cause

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <WH7854> And Satan אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said ע֣וֹר <WH5785> Skin בְּעַד־ <WH1157> for ע֗וֹר <WH5785> for skin וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> yea all that a man יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> hath will he give בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> for his life

אוּלָם֙ <WH199> But שְֽׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> put forth נָ֣א <WH4994> now יָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand וְגַ֥ע <WH5060> now and touch אֶל־ <WH413> about עַצְמ֖וֹ <WH6106> his bone וְאֶל־ <WH413> and בְּשָׂר֑וֹ <WH1320> and his flesh אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thee to thy face יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <WH1288> and he will curse

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <WH7854> unto Satan הִנּ֣וֹ <WH2005> behold בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> Behold he [is] in thine hand אַ֖ךְ <WH389> only אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> his life שְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> but save

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> forth הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> Satan מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אִיּוֹב֙ <WH347> Job בִּשְׁחִ֣ין <WH7822> boils רָ֔ע <WH7451> with sore מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> from the sole רַגְל֖וֹ <WH7272> of his foot [עַד כ] (וְעַ֥ד <WH5704> against ק) קָדְקֳדֽוֹ׃ <WH6936> unto his crown

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> And he took ל֣וֹ חֶ֔רֶשׂ <WH2789> him a potsherd לְהִתְגָּרֵ֖ד <WH1623> to scrape בּ֑וֹ וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> himself withal and he sat down בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> among הָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> the ashes

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said לוֹ֙ אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife עֹדְךָ֖ <WH5750> still מַחֲזִ֣יק <WH2388> unto him Dost thou still retain בְּתֻמָּתֶ֑ךָ <WH8538> integrity בָּרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> abundantly אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וָמֻֽת׃ <WH4191> and die

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> But he said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> to her כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> unto her Thou speakest אַחַ֤ת <WH259> as one הַנְּבָלוֹת֙ <WH5036> of the foolish women תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <WH1696> speaketh גַּ֣ם <WH1571> indeed אֶת־ <WH853> הַטּ֗וֹב <WH2896> good נְקַבֵּל֙ <WH6901> and shall we not receive מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> at the hand of God וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> adversity לֹ֣א <WH3808> and not נְקַבֵּ֑ל <WH6901> accept בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all manner זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise לֹא־ <WH3808> did not חָטָ֥א <WH2398> sin אִיּ֖וֹב <WH347> Job בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <WH8193> with his lips פ

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> heard שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH7969> three רֵעֵ֣י <WH7453> friends אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Now when Job's אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָרָעָ֣ה <WH7451> of all this evil הַזֹּאת֮ <WH2063> that הַבָּ֣אָה <WH935> that was come עָלָיו֒ <WH5921> upon וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> upon him they came אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one מִמְּקֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> from his own place אֱלִיפַ֤ז <WH464> Eliphaz הַתֵּימָנִי֙ <WH8489> the Temanite וּבִלְדַּ֣ד <WH1085> and Bildad הַשּׁוּחִ֔י <WH7747> the Shuhite וְצוֹפַ֖ר <WH6691> and Zophar הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֑י <WH5284> the Naamathite וַיִּוָּעֲד֣וּ <WH3259> for they had made an appointment יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together לָב֥וֹא <WH935> to come לָנֽוּד־ <WH5110> to mourn ל֖וֹ וּֽלְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <WH5162> with him and to comfort

וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> And when they lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵיהֶ֤ם <WH5869> their eyes מֵרָחוֹק֙ <WH7350> afar off וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not הִכִּירֻ֔הוּ <WH5234> and knew וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> him not they lifted up קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> and wept וַֽיִּקְרְעוּ֙ <WH7167> and they rent אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one מְעִל֔וֹ <WH4598> his mantle וַיִּזְרְק֥וּ <WH2236> and sprinkled עָפָ֛ר <WH6083> dust עַל־ <WH5921> over רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH7218> upon their heads הַשָּׁמָֽיְמָה׃ <WH8064> toward heaven

וַיֵּשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> So they sat down אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> on לָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> with him upon the ground שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days וְשִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> and seven לֵיל֑וֹת <WH3915> nights וְאֵין־ <WH369> no דֹּבֵ֤ר <WH1696> and none spake אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> a word כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רָא֔וּ <WH7200> unto him for they saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָדַ֥ל <WH1431> great הַכְּאֵ֖ב <WH3511> that [his] grief מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> was very
